author: GamingBolt
description:
FromSoftware's Elden Ring has become ever-present in discussions about world design, and for good reason. Both the base game and Shadow of the Erdtree are renowned for their incredible open worlds, the latter more recently for utilizing verticality to retain a unique sense of scale.

This makes Elden Ring Nightreign all the more interesting since it's essentially a multiplayer-focused map with a battle royale-esque circle closing in on players. Despite its smaller size next to the Lands Between and Land of Shadow, it still inculcates that sense of discovery, even as locations become familiar over multiple runs. 

Let's dive deeper into the world of Limveld and what makes it so enthralling ahead of Elden Ring Nightreign's launch on May 30th for Xbox Series X/S, PS5, Xbox One, PS4, and PC.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign's World May Feel Similar But Hits In Unexpected Ways

author: GamingBolt
description:
Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon has finally left early access, offering a wide, sprawling role-playing adventure with just the right amount of macabre and dark fantasy. 

While the bones will be familiar to fans of The Elder Scrolls, there are several other notable mechanics to learn and master if you want to survive. Let's go over 15 tips here to improve those odds.
title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon - 14 Things I Wish I Knew Before Playing
